blindly.translation[0].definitions[0].de: not thinking about something or trying to understand it
blindly.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: Don’t just blindly accept what you are told.
blindly.translation[0].definitions[1].de: not seeing or noticing what is around you, especially because you are upset
blindly.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: ‘I don’t know, ’ she repeated as she stared blindly down into her glass.
